attrs.script:
on mousewithin
	if the mouse is "down" then
		global chargeAmount
		if chargeAmount is "" then
			put 0 into chargeAmount
		end if
		add 1 to chargeAmount
		show cd fld "charging"
		if chargeAmount >= 15 then
			put "max charge!" into howMuch
		else
			put (1 + round(chargeAmount/3)) into howMuch
		end if
		put "Charging... " & newline & howMuch \
			into cd fld "charging"
	else
		global chargeAmount
		put 0 into chargeAmount
		hide cd fld "charging"
	end if
end mousewithin

on mouseup
	global chargeAmount
	
	put min(15, chargeAmount) into c
	put round(c/3) into c
	put 5 + c*c into c
	
	choose "oval" tool
	put mouseh() into mx
	put mousev() into my
	put 4+random(10) into radius
	put 2+random(5)+round(c/2) into howmany
	repeat with i = 1 to howmany
		repeat with j = 1 to howmany
			put mx + (i - round(howmany/2)) * c into x
			put my + (j - round(howmany/2)) * c into y
			drag from x-radius, y-radius to x+radius, \
				y+radius
		end repeat
	end repeat
	put 0 into chargeAmount
	hide cd fld "charging"
end mouseup

attrs.name: my field 1
attrs.ftxt:
geneva_12_biuosdceSee and change the source code:

Then click the Script button in the lower right corner.
